title: S&P 500 Logs Second Week of Losses After Trump Whipsaws Markets
description: US equities were little changed at the close of a volatile stretch that drove the S&P 500 into its second straight weekly decline as investors turned their attention back to earnings and monetary policy after a burst of geopolitical saber-rattling from the US president.
content: US equities were little changed at the close of a volatile stretch that drove the S&P 500 into its second straight weekly decline as investors turned their attention back to earnings and monetary policy after a burst of geopolitical saber-rattling from the US president.
